participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Curious and open-minded, always seeking to understand others.
participant_1.background: Growing up in a diverse environment, Jordan has learned to embrace different perspectives.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Playful and a bit whimsical, enjoys joking around and keeping things light-hearted.
participant_2.background: Sam is a college student who loves exploring gender identity and expression through art.

content.text: Hi! i am a boy. i am a girl.
I don't know what gender they are.
I asked about you. Are you transgender?
I know this is a puppet!
